alert.note: Alert for Dunn; Pepin (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued December 15 at 8:17PM CST until December 15 at 8:45PM CST by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: The National Weather Service in the Twin Cities has issued a * Tornado Warning for... Pepin County in west central Wisconsin... Southeastern Dunn County in west central Wisconsin... * Until 845 PM CST. * At 816 PM CST, severe thunderstorms capable of producing both tornadoes and extensive straight line wind damage were located near Wabasha, moving northeast at 70 mph. HAZARD...Tornado. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * These dangerous storms will be near... Durand and Eau Galle around 835 PM CST. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN
info.instruction: Tornadoes are extremely difficult to see and confirm at night. Do not wait to see or hear the tornado. TAKE COVER NOW! This cluster of thunderstorms is capable of producing tornadoes and widespread significant wind damage. Do not wait to see or hear the tornado. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
